title: Secret Outfit Support!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Alright, aren’t we done strengthening with this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you so much, Karin-san. I wasn’t sure if I could do it on my own.... You were a huge help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Don’t mind it. I got to see AZALEA’s live outfit early, so I benefit more from this. But it was a nice decision for you to strengthen these outfits. It really should be done. Considering these will be used in AZALEA dances.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I usually consult with Ruby or You-san about it, but this time I want the two of them to just look forward to the live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, I understand that feeling. You want to surprise them even more, right. I’m happy that you asked me about the costumes. I thought maybe people would rely on me after all....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I am relying on you! I really respect you and the rest of Nijigaku too, Karin-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Y-, you don’t have to shout that loud.... Fufu, I’m glad. Thank you, Dia-san. Ah, that’s right, Ayumu gave me something to share with you. It’s this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Is it.... Honey lemon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Spot on. Maybe we can make lemonade with these? I’d love to hear more details about the upcoming live while we drink.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My. I would like to know more about Nijigaku too. Fufu, please wait for a little bit, I’m going to boil some water.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
